alert.note: Alert for Finney; Hamilton; Kearny; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 04 at 2:43AM CST until March 04 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Fire Weather Danger Friday and Saturday Afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY TO 7 PM CST /6 PM MST/ THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 043...061...062 AND 063... * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 043 Scott...Fire Weather Zone 061 Hamilton...Fire Weather Zone 062 Kearny and Fire Weather Zone 063 Finney. * Winds...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 13 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised. Springer
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
